alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 08 at 3:59AM EDT until August 08 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...AN EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING MAY BE REQUIRED THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 115 possible. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...A Heat Advisory means that a period of unusually hot temperatures and high humidity is expected, producing heat index values of 108 degrees or higher. These conditions will cause increased risk of heat illness for people outdoors or in non air conditioned spaces.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
